text: A Skewb is a variation of the 3x3 Rubik's cube, except it turns diagonally instead of left-right and up-down. == Combinations == The Skewb can have over 3 Million combinations. The 2x2 Cube has around the same with 3674160 possible combinations. == Record == The fastest time to solve a Skewb currently goes to Carter Kucala for solving it in 0.75 seconds. He made this record on the March of the 23rd 2024. Category:Puzzles
title: Skewb
